CreateFlagComponent.help1-a: The flag serves to identify a group of social nets that have links or videos saved, making it easier to search.
CreateFlagComponent.help1-b: Creating the flag allows easy access to documents saved within the kanban in the future.
CreateFlagComponent.help2-a: The date and time represent the positioning of the flag on the timeline.
CreateFlagComponent.help2-b: It is possible to have up to 2 flags with the same date and time.
CreateFlagComponent.help3-a: Change the text colors, by following the options below.
CreateFlagComponent.help4-a: Change the contrast colors of the nets, by following the options below.
CreateFlagComponent.help5-a: Change the date background color, by following the options below.
CreateFlagComponent.help5-b: Color option 01 - same color as the flag as transparency
CreateFlagComponent.help5-g: NOTE: If the color of the flag is the same as options 2 to 5, the background color of the date will automatically assume position 01, which has transparency.
CreateFlagComponent.help6-a: Change the transparency of the flag, by following the options below.
